mood.description: The mood scored by the user on a scale of 1-10

circumplex.arousal.description: The arousal scored by the user, on a scale between -2 to 2

circumplex.valence.description: The valence scored by the user, on a scale between -2 to 2

activity.description: Activity score of the user (number between 0 and 1)
